START.name: Beach
START.desc:
You wake up and find yourself on the beach, you must've 
fallen asleep. There isn't a cloud in the sky, you can 
hear seagulls in the distance and you can smell food from the boardwalk 
to the east. You can go in any direction.

MORE BEACH.name: Beach
MORE BEACH.desc:
You walk further down the shoreline, but it doesn't seem like anything interesting
 will happen if you keep walking this way. But ther is the ocean to
 the north and the boardwalk to the south.

OCEAN.name: Ocean
OCEAN.desc:
You wade into the water, suprisingly, it isn't cold...or maybe that's 
just a warm spot. Ew. I'd swim in a different direction if I were you.

BOARDWALK.name: Boardwalk
BOARDWALK.desc:
You walk towards the boardwalk, you can hear kids laughing at the carnival further south.
There's also a very good looking hot dog stand to the east.

DEEPER OCEAN.name: Deeper Ocean
DEEPER OCEAN.desc: You keep swiming foward, and the waves are getting bigger. You can't totally see it, but there's something further to the north.

SWIMWRONGWAY.name: Ocean
SWIMWRONGWAY.desc: Nothing in this direction. But there's still something over the waves to the north.

OCEANBACK.name: Ocean
OCEANBACK.desc: You swim back towards shore,the waves are shallow.

COOL FISH.name: Ocean
COOL FISH.desc:
Theres a fish in front of you like nothing you've ever seen before. It swims up to you
 and you realize it wants to show you something. Do you follow it? YES or NO

REEF.name: Coral Reef
REEF.desc: Underwater, you can see a colorful reef with fish swimming in and out of visibility. It's very pretty.
